description: From Middle French poetique, from Latin poeticus, from Ancient Greek ποιητικός (poiētikós) from ποιέω (poiéō, “make”). Doublet of poietic.

adjectives.description: poetic (comparative more poetic, superlative most poetic)

examples: Iambics are one form of poetic meter.

entries.meaning: Characteristic of poets; romantic, imaginative, etc.
Connecting to the soul of the beholder.
